Attributes.description: Introduction to complex language structures used to communicate in a variety of situations by using different tenses and modes. Enhanced ability to comprehend, interact and express wishes or feelings in common personal and social contexts. Aligned with CEFR level A2 objectives.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: ITAL 102. (Or successful completion of CEFR Level A1.)
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 1, Days: Mon, Start Time: 8:00, End Time: 9:00, Building: To, Room: Be
